about_the_game:
It's time to train...

Or Fall...

In Love!


Manage your time between work, training and hanging out so you can reach your goal of winning the Swim Meet in three months time and secure your place in the local professional swimming team! But don't forget to have lots of fun along the way...

After returning to Paradise Cove you find that so many things have changed, your old team has a new owner and with it new requirements of their swimmers, leading to you needing to prove yourself once more before you can re-join your old friends. Fortunately the local resort has some amazing facilities for you to train at... And an array of other swimmers to train alongside in whatever way you deem fit.

Gameplay

You will be able to choose what you do each day of the game whether you wish to explore, train, work or shop in town to get items to help your training or gifts for the many women you meet along the way. Allowing you to choose your own path through the game and your own schedule based on what YOU want to achieve!

You gain three months to train your stats and prepare before the big Swim Meet competition occurs and your future will be decided. Will you succeed in rejoining the team or find a new motivation with one of the women you meet along the way?

Features

  • Enjoy amazing H-event CGs
  • Train your stats in different ways
  • Learn new skills to take to competition
  • Purchase training aids and gifts
  • Work around town to earn money
  • Manage your finances!
  • Unlock an array of adult events with a dozen women.
  • Play the way you choose!

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters depicted within this game are over 18.

The game includes suggestive scenes as well as some partial nudity with characters in their underwear/lingerie or revealing clothing. Romance and Intimacy and some adult language are also included throughout.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 +
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.6 or later
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Swim Meet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Manage your time between work, training and hanging with other swimmers so you can reach your goal of winning the Swim Meet in three months time or get lost under the sheets with some very sexy women... The choice is yours in this adult management game about swimming!
